<a name="1.2.0"></a>
# 1.2.0 (2018-03-28)

## Changes
- support `createTransport` method to create a nodemailer transport. Call at `created` if exists.

--------------------------------------------------
<a name="1.1.0"></a>
# 1.1.0 (2017-11-07)

## Changes
- add `data: {}` to `settings` for global template variables
- return with `MoleculerRetryableError` if unable to send mail.

--------------------------------------------------
